sentences.cn: 动人心弦的维多利亚时代情节剧

sentences.en: He was behaving like a character in a Victorian melodrama.
sentences.cn: 他表现得就像维多利亚时代情节剧里的角色。
我喜爱维多利亚时代的情节剧.

sentences.en: It had all the elements of melodrama you could want.
sentences.cn: 这其中你可以找到你想要看的情节紧张剧中的一切要素.

sentences.en: Man chester are once more engulfed in the delirious joy of Champions League melodrama.
sentences.cn: 曼联队再次沉浸在了欧洲冠军联赛所带来的疯狂喜悦之中.

sentences.en: The action slips from comedy to melodrama and finally to tragedy.
sentences.cn: 剧情从喜剧逐渐发展为情节剧，最后又演变为悲剧。

sentences.en: The scene in Kauai's harbour on August 26 th has been followed by more melodrama.
sentences.cn: 8月26日的考艾岛港口事件一波未平一波又起.

sentences.en: The video was seven minutes of high camp and melodrama.
sentences.cn: 那段录像里是7分钟极尽夸张搞笑的闹剧表演。

sentences.en: There was quite a melodrama when the child lost his mother in the street.
sentences.cn: 这孩子在街上与母亲走散时,哭得真够感人的.

sentences.en: We really don't need all this ridiculous melodrama!
sentences.cn: 别跟我们来这套荒唐的情节剧表演!

sentences.en: White Haired Woman was a melodrama, but in certain spots it was deliberately funny.
sentences.cn: 《白毛女》是一出悲剧性的歌剧, 但也有不少插科打浑.
